title: Big Buck Bunny
description: Three rodents amuse themselves by harassing creatures of the forest. However, when they mess with a bunny, he decides to teach them a lesson.

title: Sintel
description: A lonely young woman, Sintel, helps and befriends a dragon, whom she calls Scales. But when he is kidnapped by an adult dragon, Sintel decides to embark on a dangerous quest to find her lost friend Scales.

title: Tears of Steel
description: In an apocalyptic future, a group of soldiers and scientists takes refuge in Amsterdam to try to stop an army of robots that threatens the planet.

title: Elephant's Dream
description: Friends Proog and Emo journey inside the folds of a seemingly infinite Machine, exploring the dark and twisted complex of wires, gears, and cogs, until a moment of conflict negates all their assumptions.

title: Charge
description: In an energy-scarce dystopia, an old destitute man breaks into a battery factory but soon finds himself confronted by a deadly security droid and no way out.

title: Caminandes 2: Gran Dillama
description: Some llamas have no luck. Inspired by the good old Chuck Jones cartoons, this series of shorts follows the misadventures of one particularly persistent llama.

title: Sprite Fright
description: When a group of rowdy teenagers trek into an isolated forest, they discover peaceful mushroom creatures that turn out to be an unexpected force of nature.

title: Coffee Run
description: Fueled by caffeine, a young woman runs through the bittersweet memories of her past relationship.

title: Spring
description: Spring is the story of a shepherd girl and her dog, who face ancient spirits in order to continue the cycle of life.

title: Hero
description: A Blender '2D' open movie project, directed by Daniel Martinez Lara.

title: The Daily Dweebs
description: An adorable dog going though an emotional rollercoaster, living with and being annoyed by a very playful little alien.

title: Agent 327
description: Agent 327 is investigating a clue that leads him to a shady barbershop in Amsterdam.

title: Cosmos Laundromat: First Cycle
description: Aimed at becoming a feature film, the first episode of Cosmos Laundromat became the biggest Blender Institute production so far.
